```{r load}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggpubr)
library(ggsci)
source("Code/functions.R")
source("Code/summary.R")

patients = c(19, 20, 28, 32, 40, 52, 75, 86, 88, 89)
sessions = c(5, 6, 8, 9, 11, 12)

df = expand.grid(patients, sessions)
colnames(df) = c("patient", "session")

make_metrics_df = function(df){
  
  # for each patient, ses combination get metrics from confusion matrix + percent_correct at each cut_off
  metrics_df = df %>% apply(1, function(x){
    pred = loadPrediction(patient = x["patient"], ses = x["session"])
    row = get_metrics(pred$test$Accuracy$table)
    
    percent_correct = mutate(pred$test$Session, percent_correct = correct_med_pred / med_session)$percent_correct
    names(percent_correct) = paste0("correct_at_",pred$test$Session$cut_off)
    row = c(row, percent_correct)
    return(row)
  }) %>% t() %>% as.data.frame()

  return(cbind(df, metrics_df))
}

metrics_df = make_metrics_df(df)
```

## Metrics across patients

```{r boxplot}
metrics_df_long = metrics_df %>% group_by(patient) %>% select(Accuracy, Precision, F1.score, Sensitivity, Specificity) %>% summarize_all(mean) %>% pivot_longer(-patient, names_to = "Metric")
metrics_df_long %>% ggplot(aes(x=Metric, y = value, color=Metric)) + geom_jitter() + theme_bw() + geom_boxplot(alpha=0) + 
  ggtitle("Summary metrics for Movelet prediction (1 session training)") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + scale_color_lancet()

```

## Metrics across sessions

```{r}
table = metrics_df %>% group_by(session) %>% select(Accuracy, Precision, correct_at_0.5) %>% summarize_all(mean) 
colnames(table)[4] = "Percent Correct"
table %>% kableExtra::kable() %>% kableExtra::kable_styling("striped", position = "center")
```
